page.title: 09Blandford - By-Pass
page.content: The Blandford By-pass took a long time to make & it means a lot to Blandford. Our school does not have many lorries passing our classroom since the by- pass was finished.There are 4 round- abouts & 2 bridges-one over the Stour at Langton Long.The by-pass is on my D-block map & it passes through 4 of the 1km squares.It is 4 miles long & cost Â£5 million pounds & was opened in April this year.{Robin Queripel (9) { I was surprised when they told us that the new Information Centre near the Ham Car Park has had 3807 enquiries from British tourists,290 from foreign people,344 telephone queries and 76 by post since it opened in April this year.Sixteen volunteers work there and they gave us a Blandford Visitors Trail and Walk-About.
